评论详情: This has become my go-to workout top! I love that the sleeves don't dig into my arms and the length in the torso is great. I have a long torso so it hits maybe an inch or so below my bra line, which looks so cute with workout shorts. Breathable as well which is a definite plus!

After looking all over for short sleeve tops that would not show my armpit hair when in between waxing, I can safely say I found the perfect one. I already bought a second one and they arrived just in time for my workout. I will say, it runs small. I’m usually a small or xtra small but I was looking for something that fit comfortably and not super tight so I mega sized up. I ordered a large and found the fit of my dreams. It sits right at my belly button and my sleeves don’t exposed my pits. The fabric is stretchy and thick enough not to show your sports bra color but thin enough that it keeps you warm in winter and cool in summer.

First ordered the black one and loved it, it’s so cute and the perfect crop length without being too short. The material is good quality and feels great on my skin after I get sweaty from my workout. I ordered another one in grey, which was also cute, but I was horrified to realize after my upper body workout that my sweat stains (armpits and even at the chest) were quite visible… if you order this, I recommend the darker colors or even white and staying away from the gray. I only wear the gray top on leg days 😅

Super flattering fit. I like the color. I knew these were cropped, but they're CROPPED. They're shorter than expected, and that's saying a lot because I have no torso! Other than that I really like the tops and I'll buy again if needed.

评论概述: Brand is not consistent in size
评论详情: I bought this same shirt in pink first, loved the fit. Then I bought the same size in purple, but immediately the purple one fits differently. My pink one is still comfy to wear and looks great, but I don't like the size inconsistency. Buyer beware :)
Great workout top! Fits perfectly and isn’t too tight. It is a soft material and stretchy, falls right about an inch or 2 above my belly button.

I really like how stretchy the material is, fits really well for me. Not see through at all, although make sure you wear the right bra because the fitted material will show any lines from undergarments. Good quality and isn’t that cheap thin material that you sometimes see from other brands. Great quality for the price in my opinion. Highly recommend!

Best gym shirt I have it fits perfectly and I’ve always been insecure of my arms and the sleeves don’t move much and are very flattering. I feel like it makes my arms look slimmer and the neck line is to die for. It hugs right above the collar bone and right below the neck in just the right spot. All my clothes always roll and scrunch the; best part is that this shirt isn’t tight but it stays in place it just moves with your body. Best thing I’ve bought on Amazon for sure.
Super cute top only, I should have gotten a medium instead of a small. Definitely size up, this top runs on the smaller side.
Super, comfty and cute
I usually wear a size 8, but I noticed their yoga clothing is scaled smaller. So I ordered a large and it is very tight. I’m going to return it for an extra large. Cute top.!

I liked the price on this but on the fence on how it fits. It’s just ok - fits a little odd across the shoulders. Feels like I have to adjust it through my workout. It’s a light color and even with two sports bras - high beams show through. (If you know what I mean) lol.
Nothing wrong, it turned out good.
I felt really confident And sexy at the gym . It was not as tight which was a good thing .
Purchased this for my tween daughter who is normally a womens small but it was too small. It is so small I gave it to my 11 year old daughter and it fits her better.
Sized up because my chest and the large felt like an xs. If u have a slightly larger chest save ur self the trouble and size up 2x
I’ve been wanting a shirt that’s fitted that won’t show too much belly. I have a short torsoe and ordered a size up just to be safe. The large fit perfectly.

I am 81 years old and this is my very first crop top ever.  I needed something I could use for a bathing suit top and this was perfect for me. I had ordered the medium, then decided I needed the large and I really ;ove it,
I am 5’8” 170lbs and a medium fit me perfectly. This top is so flattering and so cute. It’s even a little supportive! The quality is great. I will be getting more Colors!!

It’s very stretchy and keeps you cool. Will buy more. I bought size large bc of my chest 34D and wanted the longer look. Exactly as advertised and color was correct. My photos may appear darker bc I don’t adjust lighting. It’s not super thin and easy to pull off not wearing a bra if just Lounging/ working around the house.

The shoulders are cut really narrow. Unless you have really narrow shoulders, the shoulder seams are going to stick straight up and pointy. Couldn't go a size up though or it would be too big in the chest.

评论概述: So flattering on any body type
评论详情: Got many compliments wearing this and my confidence in the gym has skyrocketed! Stretches quite a bit but go with your normal size. If you are on the fence about getting this, just do it. I will be getting more in different colors
Amazon recommends a small which was too tight under the arms so reordered got a medium which fits better. I’m 5’2 & 129 lbs

I'm 108 lbs and normally wear a Small but I ordered a Medium because I didn't want it too cropped, just looking for something to hit right above highrise leggings.  The black material is thick, stiff and uncomfortable and def not something I'd want to work out in.  Sizing up to Medium also meant the sleeves were a bit long and not capped so it's not that flattering.  I think the Small would dig into my armpits since even the Medium does this a little bit.  I'll return this and keep looking.
My daughter bought it. She seems to love it but it looks like all her other crop tops so it is hard to tell

评论概述: One of my favorite workout tops!
评论详情: Love this top! Its perfect for workouts. I realize I love it so much because its long enough to wear comfortably around others (as someone who is not as confident to show too much skin). Yet its still very flattering to look super cute with your workout bottoms! Highly recommend.

I am always looking for short sleeved compressive tops that are cute but breathable for aerial. This one is amazing and so comfortable! Does run small so definitely size up. I am 140 lbs, 36c and ordered a medium. Will be ordering more!
They are perfect with high waisted workout leggings. They are stretchy and hit at the perfect length. I bought another set.
Love this shirt, ran a half marathon in it in the rain and it didn’t chafe at all.

评论概述: Good for small arms and flat chests
评论详情: Got for my girlfriend as a gift. Her review was positive, but doesn’t recommend for girls with muscly arms or pointy nipples

评论概述: Definitely buy this is a good top
评论详情: This top comes exactly as expected (I got the blue one). It has very good stretch and is super good quality. The only thing I would say I dislike is the color is slightly more of a teal color than advertised. Overall would definitely recommend.

So I purchased two shirts and quality is good but one shirt arrived with makeup on it. I assume it was returned and repackaged. Both shirts are supposed to be the same size but one is smaller and tighter than the other.
I like this a lot.  It fits very snug as it should. I would say the sleeves are a little longer than represented in the photo but still good. Would get again. I got a medium
These are my favorite gym top. Really good quality and they make my shoulder look big when I work out. Great fit, great color, great quality. I bought three different colors already.
This shirt is incredible. I have bought it in multiple different colors and I love every single one of them. It's good for everyday/working out. Very happy with my purchase
This top is super cute and worth the purchase. The only thing I didn’t love is that it was slightly less cropped than I’d hoped for. Otherwise, it’s a worthwhile purchase for all the gym girlies.

评论概述: Grey sleeve length differs from others
评论详情: I have this shirt in the beige and purple shades so I was excited to purchase it in grey. The sleeves of the grey shirt happen to be longer than the sleeves of the beige or purple shirts. I prefer them shorter, but overall it’s still nice quality.
Super cute, thick and stretchy material. Absolutely love!
Great feel but fits tight around armpits and shoulders if you have any muscle at all. Like it enough overall but probably wouldnt buy more from this brand.
I love the color of this but the sleeves were tight around my arms and felt pretty awkward.

评论概述: Super comfy but not the color pictured
评论详情: I love this shirt and its great but not the color I thought it would be
Very cute and color is great but order at least 2 sizes larger unless you want a very tight fit.
I get a lot of compliments on this top. It fits well and looks really cute.

This shirt is fabulous. I don’t have to wear a bra and it holds the ladies in just right. Super comfortable, super cute! It’s very flattering and PERFECT for the gym. It keeps me cool, practically feels like I’m wearing nothing. I’m probably going to buy more in every color!

评论概述: Love it! Super flattering and comfy
评论详情: I'm a 32DDD and got a large. Fit is pretty good. Normally I get medium tops but I considered bust size and recommendations. I'm glad I got large.  I don't usually wear crop tops but it's great for working out and wearing my postpartum tummy wrap thing. Really like the fabric.

评论概述: Cute but the sleeves can be tight
评论详情: I wear this top to Pilates often. Overall it is good for the price, but I will say the arms are a little tight and it is very thin.
Was so small, I gave it away.
Was very pleased with the fit and fabric. Was breathable fabric even with intense sweating and very comfortable as a whole. Wish it came in more colors.

评论概述: isn’t stretchy like I expected it to be
评论详情: I have wide shoulders and when I tried it on it felt a bit tight. The top doesn’t really stretch like I expected it to, it feels kind of stiff when you put it on. Top does run small.

I really love this workout top! Super flattering and true to size. I even came back to order other colors. I like that it isn’t super short. Good gym find for sure!  Editing my review. The purple fit true to size. That black one ran small. Would definitely size up.
The perfect fit. I wish there was one in white 😁
This shirt is stretchy, comfortable, sweat proof and super cute! Going back to buy more colors

I love this gym top! It is a bit snug, but for me it hugged in all of the right places (helped my shoulder contour). The color doesn’t show perspiration marks too badly which I also love. Worth the price.
i have small arms so i was surprised that this was so tight in the armpits. definitely made it uncomfortable to wear so i had to return. loved the material otherwise though!
Great material and good quality. Perfect crop length. Very flattering. Exactly what I wanted :) I’m getting another color asap.
I personally thought I looked like I was wearing a toddler’s t shirt, so not for me.
Thick and good quality for the money! Size seems true.
I couldn’t even get it on and just gave it to my niece

评论概述: Perfect for a swim cover or athleisure wear
评论详情: LOVE LOVE this color, this fit, everything! Ignore what the ladies say about wearing without a bra though, nips will nip lol
It’s cute and the material is nice for working out. If you’re between sizes, I recommend sizing up!

评论概述: Great quality shirt. Super stretchy so I went up a size.
评论详情: Great quality shirt. Super stretchy so I went up a size.
I’m a size xs/s and this was TINY! Returned
Cute baby blue color and stretchy reminds me of a knockoff gymshark type shirt but it runs very small. If you are petite you can make it work
Comfortable, not shiny, more of a cotton looking top. Slightly stretchy, cute for wearing out or working out. Ordered a small.
Run a little small but it’s stretchy and cute. Size up from your normal size and you should be comfortable
Runs a little small
Love these shirts got multiple colors! Soo soft, not see thru, super stretchy! Get it!
super good quality and cute. i’m gonna buy in more colors.
the product came as expected but was too small so definitely size up!
Just bought one for my younger sister. It fits well, with good quality as said, soft, stretchy and comfortable!
Working out is great in this
Wife loves it!!
It’s the best workout shirt I’ve ever bought
Comfortable and flattering top. Good cropped length for high waisted leggings/shorts.
My new favorite workout top!!!! So comfy and breathable
Loved it but very tight. I would need extra large.
Very nice
I’m 5 ft 130 I order a medium fits perfect good material as well.
it kind of choked me, it sucked in and the seams of the neck and the arms, it made my arms numb and did not tighten any other important parts
The top is cute but if you don’t want your bra showing I wouldn’t recommend any light colors. I purchased the pink top.
Too small. Ordered a large (recommended for me on Amazon was a medium) and it was tight and very high up in the armpits.
Since it’s rated so well I thought it would be flattering but no it’s so ugly. The sleeves are weirdly long and the neckline is just weird.
Not a fan! Way too tight and odd fitting
The shoulder sleeve where kinda odd
Cheap & too small
I loved this, great material and color, but it is so cropped. Barely went past my chest. The photos make it seem like it’s a baby tee, but it’s definitely an ultra crop top, even more of a sport bra.

This is a thicker material compression top. I was worried about it being grey and showing sweat marks but these pics were after an intense leg day and there were no sweat stains! Top was very breathable and movable with me. Got tons of compliments on it and it seems to pair with a lot! I got a size medium for a little extra length. I am normally a small.

I am normally a small, but the medium size fits really well. Tight fitted. Super soft and comfortable to stretch in all directions. If I had more muscles, it would definitely pop and show through this top. The tan color and design is just like the photo.
This one has held up for a year of workouts.  It is a little worn but after weekly washes thats expected. I recommend this one.

I really like this shirt and the material is nice and light so you can really layer it up if you need to but it will also keep you cool in hot weather. I like that you can really wear this to the gym but you can also wear it every day if you want! It doesn’t look like a “gym shirt” it’s just a nice stretchy, spandex material. The fit is okay, I think it’s more cropped than I realized so I find myself pulling it down more even when I’m wearing high waisted pants but that’s more of a personal preference. It has nice stretch and I ordered the black so it’s more forgiving. I also wash it on delicate and air dry to keep its longevity, the material is a little more cheap so I worry heavy washing might wear it down.

评论概述: BUY THEM U WONT REGRET GYM BADDIES
评论详情: im usually a medium/small in shirts but when it comes to cropped tees i go with a large since im taller and want more of a loose fit. the tee felt super comfortable in my workouts i have no issue with it at all and what makes it better is that since i got a large it doesn’t look baggy on me at all

I have worked out in this top once now and I love it. I love the seamless design it reminds me of gym shark and other expesive worout brands. I also thought it was the perfect length. I usually wear a small and I sized up for the medium which i think was perfect because it is still really snug. I think def size up 1 size but love it so far!

评论概述: Excellent fit, flattering and goes to naval
评论详情: Beautiful athletic shirt that comes down to about where my high waist leggings meet. Would purchase again. Well stitched and comfortable. Runs a little tight.
My girlfriend looks amazing in this!
Fabric is great! Good length and not super thick material. Got 2 different colors I would order all!!!
Nice material and fit like a glove !!!
I LOVE these workout tops! Keeps everything tight and comfortable
I love the material!
Bought these in many colors love the top true to size!

I swear I put this too on and instantly feel like I am an influencer going to the gym. It is so flattering and comfortable. The cropped look and the slightly longer short sleeves make me feel unstoppable. Stretchy, lightweight, great color options
